title: Charlie Adam continues war of words between Stoke and West Brom over Saido Berahino drugs ban leak
text:
STOKE-ING THE FLAMES Charlie Adam continues war of words between Stoke and West Brom over Saido Berahino drugs ban leak 
Potters star says whole club 'are disappointed' after alleging Baggies used dirty tactics BY GARY STONEHOUSE Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments STOKE CITY star Charlie Adam continued the row between his club and West Brom after accusing them of leaking the Saido Berahino drug scandal ahead of last weekend’s clash. 
News emerged on Friday, 24 hours before the striker faced his former side, that the 23-year-old’s absence from the Baggies earlier in the season was down to a drugs ban. 5 Charlie Adam has continued Stoke’s war of words with WBA over new boy Saido Berahino’s drugs ban 
Berahino swapped the Hawthorns for Stoke last month as he joined Mark Hughes’ side for £15million, but he was unable to help his new employers to victory on his old stomping ground as they suffered a 1-0 defeat on Saturday . 
Keep up to date with ALL the Stoke news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
And his new team-mate Adam insists he has been good as gold since his arrival, despite the “disappointment” of West Brom ’s alleged dirty tactics. 
Speaking on BBC 5 Live, Adam said: “He’s been great. He’s a young lad who is still learning the game and he’s made a mistake. related articles Hull-bent on survival Harry Maguire excited for Arsenal clash as Hull continue to stick to fingers up to critics IAN WRIGHT Lazy Leicester stars' pitiful lack of fight means they are at risk of ruining their title legacy Mad for it Antoine Griezmann wants to be the new David Beckham as blockbuster £60million move to Manchester United takes a step closer AUBA THE MOON Manchester City to go all-out for Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang if Sergio Aguero leaves this summer PHIL-ING THE PINCH Phil Neville set to lose an incredible £1MILLION on Manchester mansion… after United sold his tenant Memphis Depay 
“We know where it has been leaked . It’s been hidden for a number of months then we play them and the day before it gets leaked, it’s only come from one club – but the thing is, it was no surprise as the club knew about it. 
“And that shows that his agent and things were honest with the club. They knew what was going to come but they were surprised that it actually came out because they had protected the player. 
“Like they would, it was their own player, and they protected him at the right time. Getty Images Saido Berahino served the drugs ban at West Brom before his £15million switch to Stoke PA:Press Association Berahino finally got a move to Stoke in January in a £15m deal Getty Images 5 News of Saido Berahino’s drugs ban was leaked just 24 hours before he faced former club West Brom on Saturday 
“But, as a club, we are disappointed that it’s come out because it should never have come out.” 
Adam’s comments follow on from his manager venting his fury following the clash between the two clubs. 
Hughes said: “They were able to keep it under wraps discreetly for six or seven months and lo and behold, just before a game against his new club, it comes out. Getty Images Charlie Adam has leapt to the defence of his new team-mate and accused WBA of leaking the news on purpose West Brom 1-0 Stoke City : James Morrison early strike is enough to clinch three points 
“It is shame because people would suggest West Brom had something to do with that… 
“That would be an unfair thing to happen, wouldn’t it? 
“I could get myself into trouble.” Reckless West Brom striker Saido Berahino snapchats in motorway fastlane
